data.name: Your Way Home Loan
data.description: Flexibly structure and manage your home loan, with Your Way Home Loans

features.additionalInfo: Borrow up to 90% of the property value prior to capitalisation of Lenders Mortgage Insurance
24/7 access via internet banking, mobile app, phone banking

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a member. Membership is open to current or retired employees of the Australian education sector or family members of members (i.e. shareholders) of the Bank.

eligibility.additionalValue: Individuals must be citizens of permanent residents of Australia.

eligibility.additionalInfo: All applications for credit are subject to responsible lending criteria. Fees and charges apply. You can find our Consumer Lending terms and conditions online or from any of our offices.

fees.name: ESTABLISHMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee includes the cost of preparing standard documents, 1 automated valuation model or desktop valuation (Please note: if a Full Valuation is required, the Fee for Full Valuation is a separate fee.), 3 title searches and settlement attendance.

fees.name: STATEMENTS-REPLACEMENT_AND_ADDITIONAL_STATEMENTS
fees.additionalInfo: Replacement and additional statements

fees.name: STATEMENTS-TRANSACTIONAL_LISTINGS_FOR_CURRENT_MONTH
fees.additionalInfo: Transactional listings for current month (on request or sent more frequently than monthly)

fees.name: DOCUMENT_COPIES
fees.additionalInfo: $25 per copy or $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Copy of cheque or deposit, recently presented cheque and/or deposit and any copy of any other document/archival search.

fees.name: PRODUCTION_OF_CERTIFICATE_OF_TITLE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you require us to produce a certificate of title (includes consent). At cost in other states.

fees.name: MORTGAGE_DISCHARGE
fees.additionalInfo: For preparation of discharge documentation on your written request. $75 in NSW and at cost in other states. At Cost.

fees.name: VARIATION_OF_SECURITY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable for preparing and lodging a change of name on a certificate of title, swapping a security, lodging notice of death, plan of subdivision etc. (this doesn't include lodgement fees charged by the Government).

fees.name: ADDITIONAL_SECURITY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for each additional security taken.

fees.name: ACCOUNT_FUNCTIONS
fees.additionalInfo: $50 per hour (minimum charge $25). Additional accounting services on your account at your request.

fees.name: MEMBER_TRACE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable by debit to your account, each time we undertake a search to locate you following a payment default if you changed your address without notifying us.

fees.name: ARREARS_ADMINISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable each time staff action a loan account, RediCredit or Credit Card account in arrears.

fees.name: DEFAULT_NOTICE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we send you a default notice asking you to remedy a default under your credit contract.

fees.name: PAPER_STATEMENT_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: This fee applies when you have elected to receive a paper statement by post in addition to a statement available to view and download in internet banking. It is in addition to fees for replacement and additional statements. For credit cards, this fee is debited to credit card account on the 7th day of the month after the end of a statement period. For all other accounts, this fee is debited to transaction, savings or loan account in that order on the 15th day of the month after the end of a statement period. Exceptions apply. For more information please refer to our Fees and Charges brochure.

eligibility.additionalInfo: The Paper Statement fee does not apply if you were a member and have not resigned your membership or the Bank has not terminated your membership before 1 November 2018; you opened an account with us and have not closed that account before 1 November 2018; or you are under 18 years of age.

fees.name: TOP_UP_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies to home loan limit increases. Fee includes 1 automated valuation model or desktop valuation (Please note: if a Full Valuation is required, the Fee for Full Valuation is a separate fee.) and 2 title searches.

fees.name: SWITCH_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you convert to another loan product other than at the end of any fixed rate or interest only period.

fees.name: FEE_FOR_FULL_VALUATION
fees.additionalInfo: A Full Valuation is where our external valuer physically attends the property to be mortgaged. The mortgage is our security for the loan. If we require a Full Valuation for more than one property, the Fee for Full Valuation is payable for each property offered as security for the loan. At Cost (Maximum $400) per security property.

fees.name: LEGAL_FEES
fees.additionalInfo: For third party professional services used in the preparation of non-standard documents. At Cost.

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE
fees.additionalInfo: If you have less than the required deposit, we may ask you to pay Lender's Mortgage Insurance (LMI). LMI protects the bank in cases of default. The LMI premium is not a bank fee. At Cost.

fees.name: REGISTRATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge, payable if and when there is a need to register, transfer or discharge an interest on the Certificate of Title. At Cost.

fees.name: TITLE_SEARCH
fees.additionalInfo: Fee applies for additional title searches that may be required in addition to those already included in the Establishment fee and Top up fee. At Cost.

fees.name: COLLECTION_CHARGES
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when we request an agent to assist our efforts to address defaults under your contract before we can commence legal action. At Cost.

fees.name: STAMP_DUTY
fees.additionalInfo: A government charge payable to State revenue office when we need to stamp your mortgage to accommodate credit provided under this contract at the amount payable under the relevant stamp duty scale. At Cost.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Your Way Standard Variable rate minimum loan size $25,000. Comparison rates quoted are based on $150,000 for a term of 25 years. Rates apply to secured loans only. WARNING: This Comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different Comparison rate

Your Way Basic Variable rate minimum loan size $150,000. Comparison rates quoted are based on $150,000 for a term of 25 years. Rates apply to secured loans only. WARNING: This Comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different Comparison rate
